question.text: Which one of the following statement is not correct about once-a-week pill for females?

options.text: It is Saheli oral contraceptive pills for females developed by scientists of CDRI, Lucknow.
It is newly discovered contraceptive pills to be taken orally having progesterone-estrogen hormone combination.
It is with very few side effects and having high contraceptive value.
It prevents Implantation by changing the nature of endometrium of uterus.

solution.text: Saheli is a newly discovered oral contraceptive pill for females. It is developed by scientists of CDRI, Lucknow. It is a non-steroidal pill which contain centchroman. It changes the nature of endometrium, so it prevents implantation. It is also called once-a-week pill, as there is no need to take this pill daily.
